mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT b.list_num,b.list_title,b.list_page,br.rent_regdate,br.mem_id FROM (SELECT booklist.*, rownum rnum FROM booklist) b, bookrent br WHERE b.list_num=br.list_num AND br.rent_status=1 AND br.mem_id=#{mem_id})

SELECT a.list_num, a.list_title, a.list_page, a.mem_id FROM (SELECT b.list_num, b.list_title, b.list_page, br.rent_regdate, br.mem_id FROM booklist b, bookrent br WHERE b.list_num=br.list_num AND br.rent_status=1 AND br.mem_id=#{mem_id}) a, grade b WHERE a.list_num=b.list_num
